segment.source: This topic describes the BitLocker Encryption Options and BitLocker Drive Encryption Control Panel items and explains the following:
segment.target: This topic describes the BitLocker Encryption Options and BitLocker Drive Encryption Control Panel items and explains the following:

segment.target: How these items are created

segment.source: BitLocker Encryption Options and BitLocker Drive Encryption Control Panel items
segment.target: BitLocker Encryption Options and BitLocker Drive Encryption Control Panel items

segment.source: The following table lists the tasks you can perform from each Control Panel item and describes how these items are created.
segment.target: The following table lists the tasks you can perform from each Control Panel item and describes how these items are created.

segment.target: BitLocker Encryption Options (MBAM)

segment.target: Change your PIN or password

segment.target: Check encryption status for a drive

segment.target: Open the TPM Management console

segment.target: Turn on BitLocker

segment.target: Suspend protection for a drive

segment.target: Back up your recovery key

segment.target: Change your PIN

segment.target: Turn off BitLocker for a drive

segment.target: Turn on BitLocker for a drive

segment.source: Decrypt a drive (appears only if the MBAM Client is NOT installed)
segment.target: Decrypt a drive (appears only if the MBAM Client is NOT installed)

segment.source: How the Control Panel item is created
segment.target: How the Control Panel item is created

segment.source: Created in Control Panel when you install the MBAM Client.
segment.target: Created in Control Panel when you install the MBAM Client.

segment.source: This item cannot be hidden.
segment.target: This item cannot be hidden.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: This item appears in addition to, but does not replace, the default BitLocker Drive Encryption Control Panel item.
segment.target: This item appears in addition to, but does not replace, the default BitLocker Drive Encryption Control Panel item.

segment.source: Appears by default in Control Panel as part of the Windows operating system, but you can hide it.
segment.target: Appears by default in Control Panel as part of the Windows operating system, but you can hide it.

segment.source: To hide it, see Hiding the Default BitLocker Drive Encryption Item in Control Panel.
segment.target: To hide it, see Hiding the Default BitLocker Drive Encryption Item in Control Panel.

segment.source: “Manage BitLocker” shortcut menu
segment.target: “Manage BitLocker” shortcut menu

segment.source: The following table describes how the Manage BitLocker shortcut menu differs depending on whether the MBAM Client is installed.
segment.target: The following table describes how the Manage BitLocker shortcut menu differs depending on whether the MBAM Client is installed.

segment.source: The term “shortcut menu” refers to options that appear when you right-click a drive in Windows Explorer.
segment.target: The term “shortcut menu” refers to options that appear when you right-click a drive in Windows Explorer.

segment.source: When MBAM Client is installed
segment.target: When MBAM Client is installed

segment.source: When MBAM Client is not installed
segment.target: When MBAM Client is not installed

segment.source: Visibility of shortcut menu
segment.target: Visibility of shortcut menu

segment.source: The Manage BitLocker option is hidden.
segment.target: The Manage BitLocker option is hidden.

segment.source: To make the Manage BitLocker option visible on the shortcut menu, which displays the option to decrypt a drive, delete the following registry key:
segment.target: To make the Manage BitLocker option visible on the shortcut menu, which displays the option to decrypt a drive, delete the following registry key:

segment.source: The Manage BitLocker option appears on the shortcut menu.
segment.target: The Manage BitLocker option appears on the shortcut menu.

segment.source: What users can do
segment.target: What users can do

segment.source: With the shortcut hidden, users can open the BitLocker Drive Encryption Control Panel item, but the option to decrypt a drive is not available.
segment.target: With the shortcut hidden, users can open the BitLocker Drive Encryption Control Panel item, but the option to decrypt a drive is not available.

segment.source: With the shortcut visible, selecting the Manage BitLocker option opens the BitLocker Drive Encryption Control Panel item, which displays the option to decrypt a drive.
segment.target: With the shortcut visible, selecting the Manage BitLocker option opens the BitLocker Drive Encryption Control Panel item, which displays the option to decrypt a drive.
